dcterms:creator: E. S. Kappenman
J. L. Farrens
W. Zhang
A. X. Stewart
S. J. Luck
dcterms:description: A standardized ERP dataset containing data from 40 subjects across six different tasks based on seven widely used ERP components, making it suitable for signal conversion across multiple tasks and subjects.
dcterms:title: ERP Core

dcterms:creator: M. Li
Y. Zhang
A. Cichocki
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of EEG recordings from 109 subjects performing various motor imagery tasks, used for brain-computer interface applications.
dcterms:title: EEG Motor Movement/Imagery Dataset (EEGMMI)

dcterms:creator: B. Kemp
A. H. Zwinderman
B. Tuk
H. A. Kamphuisen
J. J. Oberye
dcterms:description: A dataset containing polysomnography studies from 78 subjects, used for sleep stage classification and analysis.
dcterms:title: Sleep-EDF Expanded (SleepEDFx)
